title: Building `ring` with a rustc with debug assertions enabled ICEs

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
The overflow triggers in https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/1005f3bac79f16ff48fd9fbb6d8de2798115dac9/src/libsyntax/parse/parser.rs#L1187

cc @estebank
